h4601.definition: or מַעֲכָת; (Joshua 13:13), from {{h4600}}; depression; Maakah (or Maakath), the name of a place in Syria, also of a Mesopotamian, of three Israelites, and of four Israelitesses and one Syrian woman; Maachah, Maachathites. See also {{h1038}}.

h4602.definition: patrial from {{h4601}}; a Maakathite, or inhabitant of Maakah; Maachathite.

h4603.definition: a primitive root; properly, to cover up; used only figuratively, to act covertly, i.e. treacherously; transgress, (commit, do a) trespass(-ing).

h4604.definition: from {{h4603}}; treachery, i.e. sin; falsehood, grievously, sore, transgression, trespass, × very.

h4605.definition: from {{h5927}}; properly,the upper part, used only adverbially with prefix upward, above, overhead, from the top, etc.; above, exceeding(-ly), forward, on (× very) high, over, up(-on, -ward), very.

h4606.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h5954}}; (only in plural as singular) the setting (of the sun); going down.

h4607.definition: from {{h5927}}; a raising (of the hands); lifting up.

h4608.definition: from {{h5927}}; an elevation, i.e. (concretely) acclivity or platform; abstractly (the relation or state) a rise or (figuratively) priority; ascent, before, chiefest, cliff, that goeth up, going up, hill, mounting up, stairs.

h4609.definition: feminine of {{h4608}}; elevation, i.e. the act (literally, a journey to a higher place, figuratively, a thought arising), or (concretely) the condition (literally, a step or grade-mark, figuratively, a superiority of station); specifically a climactic progression (in certain Psalms); things that come up, (high) degree, deal, go up, stair, step, story.

h4610.definition: from {{h4608}} and (the plural of) {{h6137}}; Steep of Scorpions, a place in the Desert; Maaleh-accrabim, the ascent (going up) of Akrabbim.

h4611.definition: from {{h5953}}; an act (good or bad); doing, endeavour, invention, work.

h4612.definition: from {{h5975}}; (figuratively) a position; attendance, office, place, state.

h4616.definition: from {{h6030}}; properly, heed, i.e. purpose; used only adverbially, on account of (as a motive or an aim), teleologically, in order that; because of, to the end (intent) that, for (to,... 's sake),   lest, that, to.

h4617.definition: from {{h6030}}; a reply (favorable or contradictory); answer, × himself.

h4618.definition: from {{h6031}}, in the sense of depression or tilling; a furrow; acre, furrow.

h4619.definition: from {{h6095}}; closure; Maats, an Israelite; Maaz.

h4621.definition: from an unused root meaning to hew; an axe; ax, tongs.

h4624.definition: from an unused root meaning to repress; a parapet; battlement.

h4625.definition: from {{h6140}}; a crook (in a road); crooked thing.

h4626.definition: from {{h6168}}; a nude place, i.e. (literally) the pudenda, or (figuratively) a vacant space; nakedness, proportion.

h4627.definition: from {{h6148}}, in the sense of trading; traffic; by implication, mercantile goods; market, merchandise.

h4628.definition: or (feminine) מַעֲרָבָה; from {{h6150}}, in the sense of shading; the west (as a region of the evening sun); west.

h4629.definition: from {{h6168}}; a nude place, i.e. a common; meadows.

h4630.definition: feminine of {{h4629}}; an open spot; army (from the margin).

h4631.definition: from {{h5783}}; a cavern (as dark); cave, den, hole.

h4632.definition: the same as {{h4631}}; cave; Mearah, a place in Palestine; Mearah.

h4633.definition: from {{h6186}}; an arrangement, i.e. (figuratively) mental disposition; preparation.

h4634.definition: feminine of {{h4633}}; an arrangement; concretely, a pile; specifically a military array; army, fight, be set in order, ordered place, rank, row.

h4635.definition: from {{h6186}}; an arrangement, i.e. (concretely) a pile (of loaves); row, shewbread.

h4636.definition: from {{h6191}}, in the sense of stripping; bare; naked.

h4638.definition: a form of {{h4630}}; waste; Maarath, a place in Palestine; Maarath.

h4639.definition: from {{h6213}}; an action (good or bad); generally, a transaction; abstractly, activity; by implication, a product (specifically, a poem) or (generally) property; act, art,   bakemeat, business, deed, do(-ing), labor, thing made, ware of making, occupation, thing offered, operation, possession, × well, (handy-, needle-, net-) work(ing, -manship), wrought.

h4640.definition: from {{h6213}}; operative; Maasai, an Israelite; Maasiai.

h4641.definition: or מַעֲשֵׂיָהוּ; from {{h4639}} and {{h3050}}; work of Jah; Maasejah, the name of sixteen Israelites; Maaseiah.

h4643.definition: or מַעֲשַׂר; and (in plural) feminine מַעַשְׂרָה; from {{h6240}}; a tenth; especially a tithe; tenth (part), tithe(-ing).

h4644.definition: of Egyptian origin; Moph, the capital of Lower Egypt; Memphis. Compare {{h5297}}.

h4645.definition: from {{h6293}}; an object of attack; mark.

h4646.definition: from {{h5301}}; a breathing out (of life), i.e. expiring; giving up.

h4647.definition: from {{h5301}}; the bellows (i.e. blower) of a forge; bellows.

h4648.definition: or מְפִבֹשֶׁת; probably from {{h6284}} and {{h1322}}; dispeller of shame (i.e. of Baal); Mephibosheth, the name of two Israelites; Mephibosheth.

h4649.definition: a plural apparently from {{h5130}}; wavings; Muppim, an Israelite; Muppim. Compare {{h8206}}.

h4650.definition: from {{h6327}}; a breaker, i.e. mallet; maul.

h4651.definition: from {{h5307}}; a falling off, i.e. chaff; also something pendulous, i.e. a flap; flake, refuse.

h4654.definition: or מַפֵּלָה; from {{h5307}}; something fallen, i.e. a ruin; ruin(-ous).

h4656.definition: from {{h6426}}; a terror, i.e. an idol; idol.

h4657.definition: from an unused root meaning to balance; a poising; balancing.

h4658.definition: from {{h5307}}; fall, i.e. decadence; concretely, a ruin; specifically a carcase; carcase, fall, ruin.

h4659.definition: or (feminine) מִפְעָלָה; from {{h6466}}; a performance; work.

h4660.definition: from {{h5310}}; a smiting to pieces; slaughter.

h4661.definition: from {{h5310}}; a smiter, i.e. a war club; battle ax.

h4662.definition: from {{h6485}}; an appointment, i.e. mandate; concretely, a designated spot; specifically, a census; appointed place, commandment, number.

h4663.definition: the same as {{h4662}}; assignment; Miphkad, the name of a gate in Jerusalem; Miphkad.

h4664.definition: from {{h6555}}; a break (in the shore), i.e. a haven; breach.

h4665.definition: from {{h6561}}; properly, a fracture, i.e. joint (vertebrae) of the neck; neck.

h4666.definition: from {{h6566}}; an expansion; that which...spreadest forth, spreading.

h4667.definition: from {{h6585}}; a stride, i.e. (by euphemism) the crotch; buttocks.

h4668.definition: from {{h6605}}; an opener, i.e. a key; key.

h4669.definition: from {{h6605}}; an aperture, i.e. (figuratively) utterance; opening.

h4670.definition: from the same as {{h6620}}; a stretcher, i.e. a sill; threshold.

h4671.definition: or מוֹץ; (Zephaniah 2:2), from {{h4160}}; chaff (as pressed out, i.e. winnowed or (rather) threshed loose); chaff.

h4672.definition: a primitive root; properly, to come forth to, i.e. appear or exist; transitively, to attain, i.e. find or acquire; figuratively, to occur, meet or be present; be able, befall, being, catch, × certainly, (cause to) come (on, to, to hand), deliver, be enough (cause to) find(-ing, occasion, out), get (hold upon), × have (here), be here, hit, be left, light (up-) on, meet (with), × occasion serve, (be) present, ready, speed, suffice, take hold on.

h4673.definition: from {{h5324}}; a fixed spot; figuratively, an office, a military post; garrison, station, place where...stood.

h4674.definition: from {{h5324}}; a station, i.e. military post; mount.

h4675.definition: or מִצָּבָה; feminine of {{h4673}}; a military guard; army, garrison.

h4676.definition: feminine (causatively) participle of {{h5324}}; something stationed, i.e. a column or (memorial stone); by analogy, an idol; garrison, (standing) image, pillar.

h4677.definition: apparently from {{h4672}} and {{h3050}}; found of Jah; Metsobajah, a place in Palestine; Mesobaite.

h4678.definition: from {{h5324}}; something stationary, i.e. a monumental stone; also the stock of a tree; pillar, substance.

h4679.definition: or מְצָד; or (feminine) מְצָדָה; from {{h6679}}; a fastness (as a covert of ambush); castle, fort, (strong) hold, munition.

h4680.definition: a primitive root; to suck out; by implication, to drain, to squeeze out; suck, wring (out).

h4681.definition: active participle feminine of {{h4680}}; drained; Motsah, a place in Palestine; Mozah.

h4682.definition: from {{h4711}} in the sense of greedily devouring for sweetness; properly, sweetness; concretely, sweet (i.e. not soured or bittered with yeast); specifically, an unfermented cake or loaf, or (elliptically) the festival of Passover (because no leaven was then used); unleaved (bread, cake), without leaven.

h4683.definition: from {{h5327}}; a quarrel; contention, debate, strife.

h4684.definition: from {{h6670}}; a whinnying (through impatience for battle or lust); neighing.

h4685.definition: or (feminine) מְצוֹדָה; or מצֹדָה; from {{h6679}}; also (by interchange for {{h4679}}); a net (for capturing animals or fishes); a fastness or (beseiging) tower; bulwark, hold, munition, net, snare.

h4686.definition: or (feminine) מְצוּדָה; or מְצֻדָה; for {{h4685}}; a net, or (abstractly) capture; also a fastness; castle, defense, fort(-ress), (strong) hold, be hunted, net, snare, strong place.

h4687.definition: from {{h6680}}; a command, whether human or divine (collectively, the Law); (which was) commanded(-ment), law, ordinance, precept.

h4688.definition: or מְצֹלָה; also מְצוּלָה; or מְצֻלָה; from the same as {{h6683}}; a deep place (of water or mud); bottom, deep, depth.

h4689.definition: from {{h6693}}; a narrow place, i.e. (abstractly and figuratively) confinement or disability; anguish, distress, straitness.

h4690.definition: or מָצֻק; from {{h6693}}; something narrow, i.e. a column or hilltop; pillar, situate.

h4691.definition: or מְצֻקָה; feminine of {{h4690}}; narrowness, i.e. (figuratively) trouble; anguish, distress.

h4692.definition: or מָצוּר; from {{h6696}}; something hemming in, i.e. (objectively) a mound (of besiegers), (abstractly) a siege, (figuratively) distress; or (subjectively) a fastness; besieged, bulwark, defence, fenced, fortress, siege, strong (hold), tower.

h4693.definition: the same as {{h4692}} in the sense of a limit; Egypt (as the border of Palestine); besieged places, defense, fortified.

h4694.definition: or מְצֻרָה; feminine of {{h4692}}; a hemming in, i.e. (objectively) a mound (of siege), or (subjectively) a rampart (of protection), (abstractly) fortification; fenced (city, fort, munition, strong hold.

h4696.definition: from an unused root meaning to be clear, i.e. conspicuous; the forehead (as open and prominent); brow, forehead,   impudent.

h4697.definition: from the same as {{h4696}}; a shinpiece of armor (as prominent), only plural; greaves.

h4698.definition: from {{h6750}}; a tinkler, i.e. a bell; bell.

h4700.definition: from {{h6750}}; (only dual) double tinklers, i.e. cymbals; cymbals.
